thread.title: BRIEF-Chatham Lodging Trust Refinances Unsecured Credit Facility

title: BRIEF-Chatham Lodging Trust Refinances Unsecured Credit Facility

organizations.name: brief-chatham lodging trust refinances unsecured cre

text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Chatham Lodging Trust:
* CHATHAM LODGING TRUST REFINANCES UNSECURED CREDIT FACILITY, REDUCES INTEREST COSTS AND PUSHES MATURITY TO 2023
* CHATHAM LODGING TRUST - SUCCESSFULLY REFINANCED ITS $250 MILLION SENIOR UNSECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY
* CHATHAM LODGING - ‍NEW UNSECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY REPLACES PREVIOUS $250 MILLION SENIOR UNSECURED CREDIT FACILITY SCHEDULED TO MATURE IN 2020​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
